documents.document:
@liedra O_O
Although, really, that bio looks like Trump wrote it.
I am melancholy and strongly suspect I've forgotten how to talk to people.
@nfornihilism Ganondorf for the US Supreme Court.
@purserj I’m waiting for the season premiere of Supreme Court At First Sight.
My pick for Supreme Court Justice. https://t.co/ZSrHvzo9xF
holy shit it’s february?
Why am I awake so early? *meow* Oh.
@nerdi I keep meaning to spend some more time playing that. Might give it a crack.
This evening I wanted to go running to clear my head, but just tore my toe open again so I limped for 20 minutes and now feel much worse. :/
Last night I stubbed my toe so bad it tore off a huge chunk of flesh, but it took a good five minutes of tracking blood all over to notice.
Suspect I'm listening to too much Eels.
@teknetia @shrydar This was very confusing out of context.
@keysight_daniel It was a combination of trigger levels and completely underestimating the timescale. All good now. :)
@Keladeine Because it was hot and because KSP plugins are C#.
@shrydar I like to annoy people with play 1 and discard all rules.
Has anybody told Trump that he’s in US Government, not a game of Fluxx?
@liedra I’m just surprised he went straight to the grand final without any elimination rounds.
It’s 2am and instead of sleeping I’m sweating a bunch and trying to understand C# delegates.
On the plus side, I am supporting multiple devices - hopefully large scale simpits should be much easier. https://t.co/38xsyMuEEX
@rellarc79 They promise to do it better, faster and cheaper. And then unsurprisingly deliver a turd and expect you to be grateful.
@stibbons And the upshot of all of that is that I’m now using a standard nuget library for the serial port, but won’t support Windows 10.
@_dnch I’m using it to decode serial data. Basically on overpowered logic analyser. Pretty sweet stuff.
@aimee_maree Apparently doesn't realise that foreign-owned media is about the only reason she has a job, either.
Getting back in to hacking my KSP controller. I'm sometimes surprised that I know what I'm doing. https://t.co/OhkvTm2bu7
I know I’ve used my oscilloscope to grab serial traffic from an arduino before, but can’t seem to get it right now. :/

You’re having a pretty bad day when the dude from Stranger Things wants to punch you in the face.
Hopefully.
@purana Oscilloscopes are very, very awesome things to own. :D https://t.co/JLqOEgtKDz
@purserj The replies to that tweet are *amazing*
@liedra It’s basically like talking to your teammate two desks over on chat instead of in person. Thumbs up.
“Wait you know java?” from the guy who wasn’t even born the last time I wrote any serious java.
Fine all weekend, feeling like utter shit this morning. Is there such thing as a weekday flu?
@nkav That was the shittiest segue ever, just FYI.
FYI the line being toed by Australian conservative commenters is "it's not a Muslim ban silly leftards". https://t.co/eWKfX7u2RP
@nkav Nah, I'll skip dreaming and just keep joking about it thanks.
Idly wondering if the US government is still under warranty.
@internetofshit I like how your replies are currently exploring alternative meanings of your username.
@spooky_girl Have to bring your own splashes at the pool. :-(
@jamezpolley @TaniaWalker TUZ SHIRTS *grabby hands*
(I don’t have a bath but I really really wish I did)
Chunk of topside marinating in beer and spices. @stibbons marinating in cold bath.
@jaimekristene Being able to look at a real dollar figure was great motivation for me. :)
4 months ago I stopped drinking and started saving booze money. After donating to GX Aus, Outreachy and buying new… https://t.co/vK5evZy85r
I'm just saying that sometimes an orbital sander is better than a soapy cloth.
Bloke in the shop let me buy a meat pie and coffee for breakfast even though I wasn't wearing a high-vis shirt. #blessed
*wibble*
@benno37 Because choosing the right cover art for Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter is definite more important than mopping the bathroom.
@benno37 This is how I avoid trying to clean the house.
Well yes, obviously I’m spending Friday night obsessively curating my media collection.
@benno37 @slashr @penelly Well I for one don’t want to be there when that fight breaks out.
@chrisjrn Only just left Kokiri Forest, hadn’t noticed much difference yet apart from needing to come back with a hook shot. Awesome. :D
How can I tell which ones are the *real* alt-gov accounts?
@chrisjrn I’ve been playing OoT every year or so since it first game out, but this is first time on master quest. Bizarro!
Started playing Ocarina of Time on master quest mode. Having everything mirrored is much more disorienting than expected.
tfw @PressSec’s password is the same as your luggage.
@nerdi @techoglot If it was your hair filling out your TPS reports then there might be a problem.
@lokified This guy sounds kind of amazing.
@stibbons (it was a three line patch, and it was not fun)
I’ve been working in a java shop for three years, but my team just expressed absolute horror that I might have written any in that time.
@benetherington With. Although I guess it could also be for. https://t.co/HEgQUiK5Zn
@benno37 I mean literally trawling using magnets. My youtube recs are weird. https://t.co/HEgQUiK5Zn
Today I learned magnet fishing is apparently a thing.

Today I am Cougher McCougherson.
*cough*
@jaimekristene There’s a pretty solid chance that’ll happen anyway.
How can I stop this Thursday feeling like a Saturday?
@nerdi A slightly damp couch fort is also acceptable.
@nerdi Drape it over a couple of chairs works for me. Maybe something on each chair seat to weigh it down.
@NforNihilism That said, hooray for punching fucking Nazis though m
@NforNihilism Same suit. Same Pepe. Same sign in the background. Same black hoodie.
@NforNihilism I read a thing that said he got punched twice in the same day by the same puncher.
Help none of my limbs are responding to instructions.
Walked 12km from Faulconbridge to Springwood. Lovely, but not recommended after dealing with a cold the last couple of days. 😰
@Ascii211 Blue. Always blue.
@argumatronic @afcowie We don’t get many FP submissions, you should definitely consider writing one!
Today was the worst timed cold ever. Really hope it's cleared up some by tomorrow.
@benno37 Honestly, the fact that it just wasn't very good is also a significant factor.
@benno37 @timl Might be a good way to take care of that one bone he hasn't broken, too.
@MarcinS Gosh, why don't you just salt the earth while you're at it.
@hexsteph Work paid for my Aeron, but I'd definitely buy my own if they hadn't.
Dammit, body. Stop being sick.
@MarcinS @Demios101 Reddit: not even once.
*empties every kitchen cupboard looking for water bottle* *two hours later finds water bottle in fridge. full of water*
Just realised I think I have a use for trello. This is exciting!
I want to bbq things but there is a cat sitting on me.
Shots fired. https://t.co/W296YmTaFS
@_dnch You can literally get letsencrypt running with a `curl | sudo sh` and you can’t complain about that without being a massive hypocrite
@Brocklesnitch So basically you'd be doing a public service?
Watching the rain radar with bated breath.
@benno37 Mostly I’m just impressed the government came up with a way to make it *worse*.
grumping around a little
@demios101 I was flying in a wing with my little brother, he took that screenshot.
This train is at optimal nap temperature.
Look, sometimes you just crave a chiko roll, you know?
@_dnch I think googling “nazi punch compilation” at work is about where I draw the line for today.
@steve_evil @pjf I’ve seen somebody do `docker run | sudo bash`, but my brain is trying to shield me from it, can’t recall what it was now.
@br3nda I want to turn my IoTuz in to a general homeassistant remote.
Stocking up on Fisher space pens. I keep losing the little buggers.
It's ok you guys I was only completely wrong about *most* of what's been getting my goat this month.
@nfornihilism I’m pretty upset nobody seems to have shooped Pepe’s head on to him yet.
It is 2017 and apparently we are having a serious discussion about the legitimacy of Nazism. Well… OK then.
I tried watching the Spicer press briefing but it literally made my head hurt.
